Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, shield, shield of faith, shield of law, shield other, creator must be lawful

sections.body:
The staff of defense is a simple-looking polished wooden staff that throbs with power when held defensively. It allows use of the following spells:

  • Shield (1 charge)
  • Shield of Faith (1 charge)
  • Shield other (1 charge)
  • Shield of law (3 charges)
